name: barcode orange dog day bed
description:
As seen in Modern Dog magazine

This comfortable Dog Day Bed is enclosed by a wall of fibber-filled bolsters, making it perfect for dogs that prefer a little extra security or use as a head rest. The bottom cushion can be removed and used on its own as a crate mat. Simply unzip the covers to wash. The Dog Day Bed is available in four different sizes and seven designs to fit your home decor. 

Features:
•	100% cotton fabric cover
•	Polyester fibre fill
•	Removable bottom cushion can be used as a crate mat
•	Removable, washable cover
•	Made in Canada
•	Available in Barcode Blue, Barcode Orange, Broadstripe, Dog Brown, Dog Natural, Petal, and Script
•	Available sizes

X-Small •18" W x 20" L •Up to 10 lbs
Small •24" W x 28" L •10 - 20 lbs
Medium •30" W x 36" L •20 - 50 lbs
Large •36" W x 44" L •50+ lbs

* Due to strict health regulations dog beds cannot be restocked and resold. Returns/Exchanges are not accepted.


Please Note: This item ships vacuum-packed for easy storage. Vacuum-packed beds normally take 24-48 hours to take shape after being unwrapped. Some beds may need additional fluffing to help the interior separate and plump.

name: dog print/natural hoodie bed
description:
Just for your little furry friends! forthedogs Hoodie bed provides a cosy cave for small dogs (and cats) that love to burrow... or roll the hood over to create a bolster. Either way this Hoodie bed is a comfortable and warm place to sleep for your beloved four-legged friend. And, they are completely reversible! 

Features: 
•	100% cotton fabric cover
•	Polyester fibre fill
•	Completely reversible
•	Machine washable, tumble dry low
•	Made in Canada
•	Available in Petal/Blue, Script/Blue, Broadstripe/Khaki, and Dog Natural/Natural
•	Available sizes

Small •14" W 20" L •Up to 10 lbs
Large •24" W x 30" L •10+ lbs

* Due to strict health regulations dog beds cannot be restocked and resold. Returns/Exchanges are not accepted.

name: yum bowl
description:
Designed by Karim Rashid. The designer-chic sturdy and stable Yum bowl with useful handle and non-skid bottom is 100% lead free! 

Features: 
•	100% lead free
•	Non-skid bottom
•	Available in Bubble Gum, Blueberry, Neon Lime, and Chocolate Brownie. 
•	Coming Soon Cloud White
•	Available sizes Small  7” and Large 9.5”

name: tazlab bowl
description:
When adventuring with dogs, they need water and food. Cumbersome metal bowls do not fit well in backpacks, and they slide around the back of the car. Sewn fabric bowls just don't stand up as tall as we wish they would. Tazlab came up with the Aqua-Fur, the cutting edge in dog travel bowls, made from FDA approved food grade silicone which does not off gas, does not contain BPEs, does not have any nooks and crannies for bacteria to breed in, and best of all it folds up to stash just about anywhere. Just like silicone bakeware the bowls are dishwasher safe, which means that when it gets all slobbery and caked with food it is a breeze to sanitize. You can even bake a bowl shaped cake if you feel like it! The silicone travel bowl is a drooly dream come true for every dog lover!

Features:

•	Made from FDA approved food grade silicone
•	Does not contain BPEs
•	Dishwasher safe and microwave safe
•	Available in Fire Red, Water Blue, Grass Green, and Sun Orange
•	Weight 8 oz – holds 1 litre

name: x bone
description:
Designed by Karim Rashid. This floatable fetch toy is great for hot summer days in the water. NOT INTENDED AS A CHEW TOY!

Features:
•	Durable non-toxic polymer
•	Available in Blueberry and Neon Lime
•	One size

name: forthedogs Bandana
description:
Calling all the gorgeous pups! The forthedogs bandanas in three bright and beautiful colours are sure to keep your furry friends looking supper savvy. Let your little one be the envy of the others in town.

Features: 
•	100% cotton 
•	100% hypoallergenic
•	Made in Canada
•	Available in Orange, Brown, Blue
•	One size

name: WildSideLobster
description: WildSideLobsterTreats for Cats and Dogs are formulated for Senior Cats and dogs that need their special treats to break apart easily. Two individual 20 gram pouches inside a beautiful, re-usable gift box.  Made from Langoustine Lobster Claw meat and wild Alaskan Pollock. A Very unique treat! These treats are FREEZE DRIED and pouched in China under strict HAACP quality guidelines. GRAIN FREE.
